prompt:
THEME: Victorian Steampunk Industrial

STYLE:
- Brass gears, copper pipes, steam vents
- Victorian architecture with mechanical additions
- Brown/bronze/copper color palette, warm lighting
- Bioshock Infinite / Dishonored aesthetic

ASSET DETAILS:
- Grass: FLAT cobblestone tile only - warm brown stone pavement with brass accents, no structures
- House: Victorian townhouse with clockwork additions, smokestacks
- Shop: Gadget shop or automaton store with gear displays
- Park: Clockwork garden with mechanical fountains, brass trees
- University: Grand clocktower academy with observatories, airship dock
- Market: Industrial market with conveyor belts, steam-powered stalls
